meanings.definition: A person who takes part in an activity with another or others.
meanings.sent1: My friend is my partnering in the dance competition.
meanings.sent2: The partnering in the project helped us achieve success.
meanings.sent3: The partnering in the game made it more fun and exciting.
meanings.sent4: Being a partnering in the adventure felt like being part of a team.
meanings.sent5: The partnering in the play made the performance outstanding.

meanings.definition: To form a partnership with someone.
meanings.sent1: I am partnering with my colleague on the new project.
meanings.sent2: They are partnering to create a new business together.
meanings.sent3: Partnering with my sibling in the game was a blast.
meanings.sent4: She is partnering with a famous chef to open a restaurant.
meanings.sent5: Partnering with experts will help us improve our skills.

meanings.definition: The act of working together as partners.
meanings.sent1: Effective partnering is crucial for the success of the team.
meanings.sent2: The partnering between the two companies led to great results.
meanings.sent3: The partnering in the cooking class was full of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Their partnering in the project was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The seamless partnering between the departments impressed everyone.
